results.question: ________ is a quick way to view only the task or resource information you choose.
In the Sort dialog box, you can utilize up to ________ nested levels of sort criteria.
When you use grouping, the ________ data rows are set off by a colored background.
When AutoFilter is turned on, small ________ are visible next to the column headings.
A way to reorder task or resource information in a table and to display summary values according to various criteria you can choose is called a(n) __________.
The _________ dialog box shows you all of the predefined filters that are available to you for tasks or resources.
A(n) _________ is a way of ordering task or resource information in a view by the criteria you specify.
When you apply a filter, you may see gaps in the order of the ________.
When you sort data in your project, the sort applies to the active _________, no matter which table is displayed.
A tool that enables you to see or highlight in a table only the task or resource information that meets criteria you choose is a(n) __________.
Which of the following is the simplest way to reorganize data in Microsoft Project?
The __________ function lets you reverse actions you have performed in Microsoft Project.
Which of the following is the one instance in which the actual data of your project is changed by sorting?
results.correct_answer: The Permanently renumber resources check box is selected.
incorrect_answers: The Multiple Level Undo function is disabled.
The project is saved before the sorting is reversed.

results.question: When you apply a group to your project schedule, the data in the summary rows cannot be changed directly because of which of the following?
results.correct_answer: It is derived from subordinate data.
incorrect_answers: It will cause the grouping to become permanent.
It will alter the data in your project schedule.
It will cause an error in the grouping function.

results.question: When AutoFilter is on, clicking on the down arrow next to the column heading does which of the following?
results.correct_answer: Allows you to select criteria to apply to the filter
incorrect_answers: Sorts the data in descending order

results.question: How many times can the Multiple Level Undo function be used?
results.correct_answer: Up to 99 times, or until the original data is restored

results.question: If a view has a filter applied to it, the name of the filter will be displayed in the Filter box on the _________ ribbon.
There is no visual indicator that a task or resource view has been sorted other than which of the following?
results.correct_answer: The order in which the rows of data appear
incorrect_answers: The small s at the top of each data column
There is no visual indicator to show a view has been sorted.

results.question: Grouping might be helpful if you are trying to see which of the following?
incorrect_answers: Only the tasks that contain the word weekly
The tasks ordered from highest to lowest cost
The total cost of each resource group

results.question: You cannot save custom settings that you have specified for which of the following?
